title: _D3DHAL_DP2DRAWINDEXEDPRIMITIVE (d3dhal.h)
description: The D3DHAL_DP2DRAWINDEXEDPRIMITIVE structure is used by the D3dDrawPrimitives2 callback function to render a primitive using vertex indices.
